name: Zoo Clean Up
description:
The Good News:
Congratulations!!! You are the proud owner of your own Zoo!!!

The Bad News:
Unfortunately, in our previous game The Great Zoo Escape 2 all the animals in the zoo escaped. Since then, teenagers have moved in and completely trashed the place. What a mess!! Not only have they made a mess, but they've also littered the zoo with BOOBY TRAPS!! And they keep adding more TRAPS every day!

The Really Bad News:
You only have 1 week (7 days) to get the zoo cleaned up or the city will turn your zoo into a parking lot. Each day you'll be required to clean up a different type of garbage (metal, hazardous waste, recyclables, organic waste etc.)

This isn't your grandmother's hidden object game, it won't be a casual stroll through the zoo. So roll up your sleeves and help clean up over 100 hidden objects, just remember to watch out for all of the TRAPS!
